markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18+"
    pfs=""
>
[Orichalcum Weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by weapon

**Bulk**  varies by weapon
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=276)

</column>

---

Orichalcum weapons can have four magic property runes instead of three. Due to orichalcum’s temporal properties, etching the [_speed_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304) weapon property rune onto an orichalcum weapon costs half the normal Price (though transferring the rune to a weapon made of another material requires you to first pay the remaining Price and then pay the cost to transfer). 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Orichalcum Weapon (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 22,500 gp (+ 2,250 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** at least 11,250 gp of orichalcum + 1,125 gp per Bulk
name: Orichalcum Weapon (High-Grade)
